executeNonstop

public com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet executeNonstop(int timeoutMls)
                                                  throws TimeoutException
Description copied from interface: QueryOperation
Synchronously executes select operation for the given time interval in milliseconds and returns object with type T. Useful for SLA services that guarantees response time.

Specified by:
executeNonstop in interface QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,O extends QueryOperation<com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet,O>>
Returns:
object with type T or throws TimeoutException if execution time is grater than expected. Actually does not cancel operation on Cassandra servers due to unsupported feature in Cassandra itself.
Throws:
TimeoutException
